title: Replacement EN-EL14a, EN-EL14 Ultra High Capacity Li-ion Battery For Nikon D5300, D3300, D5100, D5200, D3100, Nikon Df and D3200, P7100, P7700 Digital Camera - Fully Decoded! (Nikon EN-EL14a Replacement) + ButterflyPhoto MicroFiber Cleaning Cloth
description: This Kit Includes Some Of The Essential Accessories You Need To Take Full Advantage Of Your New Nikon D5300, D5100, D5200, D3100, D3200, Nikon Df, P7700 Digital SLR Camera Kit Includes:1) Replacement EN-EL14a Hi-Capacity (1500 Mah) Lithium Ion Battery Fully Decoded! - Replaces Nikon EN-EL14a 2) ButterflyPhoto MicroFiber Cleaning Cloth The Replacement EN-EL14a Rechargeable Lithium-ion Battery Pack has a capacity of 1500mAh, making it possible to shoot many photographs with your Nikon DSLR on a single battery charge.The EN-EL14a battery also communicates with the Nikon series DSLR cameras, so that you can always check the remaining capacity, shutter count and recharge performance on the cameras power source info screen. Compatible:Nikon Df DSLRNikon D3300 DSLRNikon D5300 DSLRNikon D5100 DSLRNikon D5200 DSLRNikon D3100 DSLRNikon D3200 DSLRNikon Coolpix P7100Nikon Coolpix P7700 UPDATE AS OF 12/13/2013 New Replacement Battery For Nikon EN-EL14a. Works With Nikon's New Firmware Update. This Battery Will Not Suffer From the Adverse Memory Effects That are Normally Associated With Other Battery Types. BUYER NOTE: Please Be Aware Of Sellers Other Than ButterflyPhoto and Amazing Deals Online That Will Substitute This Battery to Inferior Quality Batteries or Standard Replacement EN-EL14 Batteries That Will Not Work With Nikon's New Firmware Update
